bundle.name: CIS Kubernetes Benchmark v1.6.1
bundle.description:
Automated Validation of Kubernetes CIS Benchmark v1.6.1 Prescriptive guidance for establishing a secure configuration posture for Kubernetes 1.6.1
For additional reference: https://www.cisecurity.org/benchmark/kubernetes/

rule.name: Ensure that Service Account Tokens are only mounted where necessary (RBAC)
rule.description: Service accounts tokens should not be mounted in pods except where the workload running in the pod explicitly needs to communicate with the API server. Mounting service account tokens inside pods can provide an avenue for privilege escalation attacks where an attacker is able to compromise a single pod in the cluster. Avoiding mounting these tokens removes this attack avenue.
rule.remediation:
Modify the definition of pods and service accounts which do not need to mount service account tokens to disable it.

**References**
1. https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-service-account/
